Table: file

file Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
file character varying UNIQUE NOT NULL
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT nextval('file_id_seq'::regclass)
thumbnail character varying
mime_type character varying NOT NULL
sha1 character varying
size integer
location character varying

 

file Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_file_identifier CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))
